cu.explanation_en: Setting the SCTP input streams to 100 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation error.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SSB block power to 100 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation error.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 區塊功率設定為 100 超過最大允許值，會導致配置驗證錯誤。
